job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>io173 is partnered with a Management Consulting firm to scale up their Machine Learning Engineering team. Our client's primary focus is on end-to-end development of analytics solutions and their deployment at scale. This role will play a key part in developing and deploying ML models in a production environment.</p><p><br></p><p>We are looking for experienced ML Engineers with professional experience interested in the Management Consulting Industry.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Productionize and deploy ML models.</li><li>Working closely with data scientists and data engineers to produce and deploy machine learning models.</li><li>Refactoring code into reusable libraries and tools.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Masters Degree in CS or relevant area.</li><li>3+ years professional experience in Machine Learning including Linear Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest, Deep Learning. Experience must be outside of Academia and internships or candidates will not be considered.</li><li>3+ years in ML Engineer role deploying ML solutions in customer environments.</li><li>Python programing absolute must- Advanced</li><li>Strong skills and experience in OOD/SW Engineering concepts including industry best practices.</li><li>Experience with C, C++, Java or Scala highly preferred.</li><li>Experience in ML Research is a bonus, consistent experience in production environments is a MUST.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Expectations:</strong></p><ul><li>Must be located in or willing to relocate to a location commutable to one of our client's major hubs: Boston, Chicago, New York City.</li><li>Must be willing to travel for work, this will not be a fully remote role.</li><li>We will not consider C2C candidates for this role, only direct-hire candidates.</li><li>Candidates will go through multiple technical interviews including testing and coding rounds. </li></ul><p><br></p><p>io173.com acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment. By applying for this job you accept the Terms &amp;Condition's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at io173.com</p>
